definition: grain that has begun to ripen/variant of 衹|只[zhi3]
classifier for birds and certain animals, one of a pair, some utensils, vessels etc
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: What has three hands but only one face?
sentences.chinese: 什么东西有三只手，却只有一张脸？

sentences.english: The thelloef was caught stealing and was sent to the police.
sentences.chinese: 三只手被逮住偷工具，并且被送到差人那。

sentences.english: I suppose you don't know what a prig is.
sentences.chinese: 我看你不知道什么是三只手吧？

sentences.english: When he opens these arms, he is like a giant octopus.
sentences.chinese: 三只手张开来，就像大章鱼。

sentences.english: Tommy's father has three arms. They are big and strong.
sentences.chinese: 汤米的爸爸有三只手，又粗又强壮。

sentences.english: The thelloef is peeping through a keyhole.
sentences.chinese: 那个三只手从钥匙孔中窥视。

sentences.english: The man in black on the bus is a pickpocket.
sentences.chinese: 车上穿黑衣服的男人是个三只手。

definition: left and right hands/(fig.) capable assistant/right-hand man
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]
